channel.title: Homes on Shubham Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Shubham Sharma

item.description: Biography My name is Shubham Sharma and I am currently a final year student pursuing Dual-Degree(B.Tech-M.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur, India. My research is primarily on Knowledge Compilation, AI and Cyber Security. During my curriculum I have done various projects and courses on these topics and I am fascinated by their research prospects. Currently I am working with Dr. Kuldeep Meel and Dr.
